attributes.action: review the UK's capital punishment policy for murderers/rapists and knife attackers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im sick of the news channels asking what to do about the rate of crime in the UK we should re-introduce capital punishment and do away with the burden of murderers/rapists/pedophiles and knife attackers

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
